name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Gary WILLIAMS, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Gary WILLIAMS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of January, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted, limited to the issue of whether the Superior Court erred in denying petitioner appellate review on the merits.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Scott B. Rudolf, Philadelphia, for Petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
688 A.2d 167
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Gary WILLIAMS, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 22, 1997.
Scott B. Rudolf, Philadelphia, for Petitioner.
